analysis.description:
Broker._withdraw (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#1343-1371) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _withdrawer.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#1363)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#94) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#99-100)
Broker._validateIsContract (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#1620-1624) is declared view but contains assembly code
Broker._getSanitizedReturnValue (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#1628-1658) is declared view but contains assembly code

Broker.slowWithdraw (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#840-858) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(announcement.amount == _amount,Invalid amount)

Reentrancy in NukeBurner.executeBurn (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(nuke.allowance(_depositer,address(broker)) == 0,Invalid approved amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- preparedBurnAmounts (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol)
	- preparedBurnHashes (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol)

Reentrancy in NukeBurner.prepareBurn (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(nuke.allowance(_depositer,address(broker)) == _depositAmount,Invalid approval amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- preparedBurnAmounts (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol)
	- preparedBurnHashes (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol)

Broker._validateIsContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#1620-1624)
	- /unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#1621-1624

Broker._getSanitizedReturnValue uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#1628-1658)
	- /unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#1633-1657
BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#94)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol:
	- Version used: ['0.4.25', '^0.4.24']
	- /unique_chucks/8/0xc862e8ce69a67aef7d19d8204a79973aced05154.sol#3-5 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
